text: Heavyweights is a 1995 Disney movie directed by Steven Brill. Heavyweights is about a fat camp for children that is taken over by fitness expert Tony Perkis (Ben Stiller). ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:Disney movies Category:1995 movies Category:English-language movies Category:1995 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies
title: Heavyweights
